main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in El Centro, California in the 1950s, including round, silver objects rising and passing out of sight, elongated and dark objects hovering before accelerating at high speed, and orange objects moving in circular courses before disappearing.
interesting points: One sighting described a round, orange object the size of a dime at arm's length, which moved in horizontal flight and then in the opposite direction before disappearing in fifteen minutes.
An Air Force operator reported observing an elongated and dark object hovering at a close distance before accelerating to a high rate of speed and heading south.
A civilian observer reported a round, orange object moving in a circular course before disappearing.
The size of the observed objects ranged from the size of a pinhead to an estimated diameter of 18-20 feet.
One of the reports mentioned that radar searching was negative, indicating that the object may have evaded detection by radar systems.
sighted object: various objects such as round, silver objects, elongated and dark objects, and round orange objects
witnesses: USAF Tactical Institute Center operator, civilian observer, Air Force personnel
